newsitem.title: EU: EP LEGAL AFFAIRS COMMITTEE AGENDA - JAN 27-28.
newsitem.headline: EP LEGAL AFFAIRS COMMITTEE AGENDA - JAN 27-28.

text.p: Committee on Legal Affairs and Citizens' Rights [[ Monday 27 January 1997 ]] ===] Monday, 27 January 1997 ===] afternoon 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE220.997 ) 1.1 In the presence of the Council and Commission 2. Possibly, consideration of items held over from meeting of: - 21., 22. - 23.01.1997 (PE220.994 ) 3. The legal protection of biotechnological inventions (T04629) (96/017) COD95350 COM(95)0661 C4-0063/96 + JURI Fond R ROTHLEY Willi. (PSE) (PE218.021 ) - Consideration of draft report - Decision on procedure ===] Tuesday, 28 January 1997 ===] morning 4. State of application of the general system for the recognition of higher edu cation diplomas (T04787) (96/043) COS0397 COM(96)0046 C4-0194/96 + JURI Fond R FONTAINE Nicole. (PPE) (PE217.329 ) - Adoption of draft report 5. Supervision of insurance companies that belong to a group (T03171) (95/124) COD95245 COM(95)0406 C4-0464/95 + JURI Fond R MOSIEK-URBAHN Marlie (PPE) (PE217.340 ) - Consideration of draft report - Decision on procedure 6. Credit institutions, solvency ratio and investment firms (amendment of Direc tives 77/780, 89/647 and 93/6) (T03170) (96/066) COD96121 COM(96)0183 C4-0258/96 + JURI Fond R MOSIEK-URBAHN Marlie (PPE) (PE217.903 ) - Consideration of draft report - Decision on procedure ===] afternoon 7. Complementary (or non-conventional) medicine (T03525) (94/071) (T03525) INI0330 INI0330 + JURI Avis A ALBER Siegbert. (PPE) (PE219.736 ) + JURI Avis A F ENVI Fond R LANNOYE Paul. (V ) (PE216.066 ) - Adoption of draft opinion 8. Commission Green Paper on financial services: 'Meeting consumers' expectatio ns' (T04901) (96/083) (T04901) COS0425 COM(96)0209 C4-0339/96 + JURI Avis A FLORIO Luigi A. (UPE) (PE218.788/AM1) F ENVI Fond R MARINUCCI Elena. (PSE) (PE220.154 ) - Adoption of draft opinion 9. Any other business 10. Date of next meeting (PE/VII/OJ/05-97 ) 10.1 Deadline for texts for translation before the next meeting (reminder): - Friday, 17.01.1997 END OF DOCUMENT.
